con:testCase.name: GoodCase-TchiboService
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests positive business cases from tchibo evolution service based on documentation in svn: ... \src\trunk\SRs\Interfaces\Tchibo\ST_OVD_Portal_DP_DRC_U-036_Tchibo_IFS.pdf
Additionaly msisdn in format +49... are currently supported for Tchibo. Tests contained msisdn in format +49... are with name: *-MSISDN-Nr=9Signs
